trans-unit.source: FastTrack Center Benefit Process for Azure Active Directory Premium
trans-unit.target: FastTrack Center Benefit Process for Azure Active Directory Premium

trans-unit.source: If your organization is eligible for the FastTrack Center Benefit for Microsoft Azure AD Premium, you can work remotely with Microsoft specialists to get your Microsoft Azure AD Premium environment ready for use.
trans-unit.target: If your organization is eligible for the FastTrack Center Benefit for Microsoft Azure AD Premium, you can work remotely with Microsoft specialists to get your Microsoft Azure AD Premium environment ready for use.

trans-unit.source: To learn whether your organization is eligible, see <link><linkText>FastTrack Center Benefit for Azure Active Directory Premium</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: To learn whether your organization is eligible, see <link><linkText>FastTrack Center Benefit for Azure Active Directory Premium</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: This article provides the following:
trans-unit.target: This article provides the following:

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Overview of the onboarding process</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Overview of the onboarding process</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Expectations for your source environment</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Expectations for your source environment</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Phases of the onboarding process</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Phases of the onboarding process</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Microsoft responsibilities</linkText><title></title></link> for each phase
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Microsoft responsibilities</linkText><title></title></link> for each phase

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Your responsibilities</linkText><title></title></link> for each phase
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Your responsibilities</linkText><title></title></link> for each phase

trans-unit.source: Here’s what you can expect when onboarding is complete:
trans-unit.target: Here’s what you can expect when onboarding is complete:

trans-unit.source: Your Microsoft Azure AD Premium tenant is created.
trans-unit.target: Your Microsoft Azure AD Premium tenant is created.

trans-unit.source: Licensed users can access Microsoft Azure AD Premium services by using one of the following identity options:
trans-unit.target: Licensed users can access Microsoft Azure AD Premium services by using one of the following identity options:

trans-unit.source: Cloud Identities (unique Microsoft Azure AD Premium accounts).
trans-unit.target: Cloud Identities (unique Microsoft Azure AD Premium accounts).

trans-unit.source: Synchronized Identities: Microsoft Azure AD Premium accounts synchronized from your on-premises Active Directory with the Azure Active Directory Connect (Azure AD Connect) tool for customers with a single forest or multiple Active Directory forests.
trans-unit.target: Synchronized Identities: Microsoft Azure AD Premium accounts synchronized from your on-premises Active Directory with the Azure Active Directory Connect (Azure AD Connect) tool for customers with a single forest or multiple Active Directory forests.

trans-unit.source: Federated Identities--with Microsoft Azure AD Premium accounts that are:
trans-unit.target: Federated Identities--with Microsoft Azure AD Premium accounts that are:

trans-unit.source: Synchronized from Active Directory with the Microsoft Azure AD Connect tool for customers with a single Active Directory forest configuration.
trans-unit.target: Synchronized from Active Directory with the Microsoft Azure AD Connect tool for customers with a single Active Directory forest configuration.

trans-unit.source: Federated with Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) 2.0 or later from your on-premises Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: Federated with Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) 2.0 or later from your on-premises Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Overview of the onboarding process
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Overview of the onboarding process

trans-unit.source: Onboarding has two major components:
trans-unit.target: Onboarding has two major components:

trans-unit.source: Core capabilities - tasks required for tenant configuration and integration with Azure AD, if needed.
trans-unit.target: Core capabilities - tasks required for tenant configuration and integration with Azure AD, if needed.

trans-unit.source: Core capabilities also provide the baseline for onboarding other Microsoft Online eligible services.
trans-unit.target: Core capabilities also provide the baseline for onboarding other Microsoft Online eligible services.

trans-unit.source: Service onboarding - tasks required to configure Microsoft Azure AD Premium standalone or with Azure AD Connect directory synchronization or AD FS.
trans-unit.target: Service onboarding - tasks required to configure Microsoft Azure AD Premium standalone or with Azure AD Connect directory synchronization or AD FS.

trans-unit.source: The following diagram describes the timeline for using the FastTrack Center benefit.
trans-unit.target: The following diagram describes the timeline for using the FastTrack Center benefit.

trans-unit.source: The basic process is as follows:
trans-unit.target: The basic process is as follows:

trans-unit.source: Microsoft will attempt to contact you within 30 days from the date you purchase an eligible plan.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft will attempt to contact you within 30 days from the date you purchase an eligible plan.

trans-unit.source: You can also request assistance from the <link><linkText>FastTrack Center</linkText><title></title></link> if you are ready to deploy these services for your organization.
trans-unit.target: You can also request assistance from the <link><linkText>FastTrack Center</linkText><title></title></link> if you are ready to deploy these services for your organization.

trans-unit.source: To request assistance, sign in to the FastTrack Center (http://fasttrack.microsoft.com), go to the dashboard, select your company name, click the Offers tab, and click the request assistance button for the eligible service.
trans-unit.target: To request assistance, sign in to the FastTrack Center (http://fasttrack.microsoft.com), go to the dashboard, select your company name, click the Offers tab, and click the request assistance button for the eligible service.

trans-unit.source: Once onboarding support starts, we’ll set up a schedule of online meetings.
trans-unit.target: Once onboarding support starts, we’ll set up a schedule of online meetings.

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft team will help you with core capabilities, and then will help you onboard once for each eligible service.
trans-unit.target: The Microsoft team will help you with core capabilities, and then will help you onboard once for each eligible service.

trans-unit.source: All onboarding support will be provided remotely by assigned Microsoft personnel:
trans-unit.target: All onboarding support will be provided remotely by assigned Microsoft personnel:

trans-unit.source: Microsoft will remotely assist you with various onboarding activities by using a combination of tools, documentation, and guidance.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft will remotely assist you with various onboarding activities by using a combination of tools, documentation, and guidance.

trans-unit.source: If you want Microsoft to do certain configuration tasks for you, you may choose to provide appropriate access and permissions to Microsoft for carrying out these tasks.
trans-unit.target: If you want Microsoft to do certain configuration tasks for you, you may choose to provide appropriate access and permissions to Microsoft for carrying out these tasks.

trans-unit.source: Onboarding support is provided by the FastTrack Center, and is available during normal business hours for a given region.
trans-unit.target: Onboarding support is provided by the FastTrack Center, and is available during normal business hours for a given region.

trans-unit.source: Onboarding support is available in Traditional Chinese, English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Portuguese (Brazil), or Spanish.
trans-unit.target: Onboarding support is available in Traditional Chinese, English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Portuguese (Brazil), or Spanish.

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft team can work directly with you or your representative.
trans-unit.target: The Microsoft team can work directly with you or your representative.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Expectations for your source environment
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Expectations for your source environment

trans-unit.source: You may already have Microsoft Active Directory on-premise in your source environment that you want to integrate with Microsoft Azure AD Premium for leveraging rich identity management from a single console.
trans-unit.target: You may already have Microsoft Active Directory on-premise in your source environment that you want to integrate with Microsoft Azure AD Premium for leveraging rich identity management from a single console.

trans-unit.source: The FastTrack Center benefit includes helping you integrate Microsoft Azure AD Premium with your existing on-prem implementation.
trans-unit.target: The FastTrack Center benefit includes helping you integrate Microsoft Azure AD Premium with your existing on-prem implementation.

trans-unit.source: If integration is required, your source environment must be at a minimum level for that application.
trans-unit.target: If integration is required, your source environment must be at a minimum level for that application.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows what is expected in your existing source environment for onboarding.
trans-unit.target: The following table shows what is expected in your existing source environment for onboarding.

trans-unit.source: Activity
trans-unit.target: Activity

trans-unit.source: Source environment expectation
trans-unit.target: Source environment expectation

trans-unit.source: Core capabilities
trans-unit.target: Core capabilities

trans-unit.source: Active Directory forests with the functional forest level set to Windows Server 2008 or above, with the following forest configuration:- Single Active Directory forest- Multiple Active Directory forests Note: For all multiple forests configurations, AD FS deployment is out of scope for the FastTrack Center Benefit.
trans-unit.target: Active Directory forests with the functional forest level set to Windows Server 2008 or above, with the following forest configuration:- Single Active Directory forest- Multiple Active Directory forests Note: For all multiple forests configurations, AD FS deployment is out of scope for the FastTrack Center Benefit.

trans-unit.source: Service onboarding<html></html><html></html>- Microsoft Azure AD Premium
trans-unit.target: Service onboarding<html></html><html></html>- Microsoft Azure AD Premium

trans-unit.source: On-premises Active Directory and environment have been prepared for Azure AD Premium, which includes remediation of identified issues that would prevent integration with Azure AD and Azure AD Premium features.
trans-unit.target: On-premises Active Directory and environment have been prepared for Azure AD Premium, which includes remediation of identified issues that would prevent integration with Azure AD and Azure AD Premium features.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Phases of the onboarding process
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Phases of the onboarding process

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Azure AD Premium onboarding has five primary phases, as shown in the following figure:
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Azure AD Premium onboarding has five primary phases, as shown in the following figure:

trans-unit.source: Initiate
trans-unit.target: Initiate

trans-unit.source: Assess
trans-unit.target: Assess

trans-unit.source: Remediate
trans-unit.target: Remediate

trans-unit.source: Enable
trans-unit.target: Enable

trans-unit.source: For detailed tasks for each phase, see the <link><linkText>Microsoft responsibilities</linkText><title></title></link> and <link><linkText>Your responsibilities</linkText><title></title></link> sections.
trans-unit.target: For detailed tasks for each phase, see the <link><linkText>Microsoft responsibilities</linkText><title></title></link> and <link><linkText>Your responsibilities</linkText><title></title></link> sections.

trans-unit.source: Initiate phase
trans-unit.target: Initiate phase

trans-unit.source: After you have purchased the appropriate number of licenses, follow the guidance from the purchase confirmation email to associate the licenses to your existing tenant or new tenant.
trans-unit.target: After you have purchased the appropriate number of licenses, follow the guidance from the purchase confirmation email to associate the licenses to your existing tenant or new tenant.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft will verify your eligibility for the FastTrack Center Benefit.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft will verify your eligibility for the FastTrack Center Benefit.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft will attempt to contact you within 30 days from the date you purchase an eligible plan.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft will attempt to contact you within 30 days from the date you purchase an eligible plan.

trans-unit.source: You can also request assistance from the <link><linkText>FastTrack Center</linkText><title></title></link> if you are ready to deploy these services for your organization.
trans-unit.target: You can also request assistance from the <link><linkText>FastTrack Center</linkText><title></title></link> if you are ready to deploy these services for your organization.

trans-unit.source: To request assistance, sign in to the FastTrack Center (http://fasttrack.microsoft.com), go to the dashboard, select your company name, click the Offers tab, and click the request assistance button for the eligible service.
trans-unit.target: To request assistance, sign in to the FastTrack Center (http://fasttrack.microsoft.com), go to the dashboard, select your company name, click the Offers tab, and click the request assistance button for the eligible service.

trans-unit.source: Once onboarding support starts, we’ll set up a schedule of online meetings.
trans-unit.target: Once onboarding support starts, we’ll set up a schedule of online meetings.

trans-unit.source: During this phase, we’ll discuss the onboarding process, verify data, and set up a kick-off meeting.
trans-unit.target: During this phase, we’ll discuss the onboarding process, verify data, and set up a kick-off meeting.

trans-unit.source: Assess phase
trans-unit.target: Assess phase

trans-unit.source: Once the onboarding process begins, Microsoft will work with you to assess your source environment and the requirements.
trans-unit.target: Once the onboarding process begins, Microsoft will work with you to assess your source environment and the requirements.

trans-unit.source: Tools will be run to assess your environment, and Microsoft will guide you through assessing your on-premises Active Directory, Internet browsers, client devices' operating systems, DNS, network, infrastructure, and identity system to determine if any changes are required for onboarding.
trans-unit.target: Tools will be run to assess your environment, and Microsoft will guide you through assessing your on-premises Active Directory, Internet browsers, client devices' operating systems, DNS, network, infrastructure, and identity system to determine if any changes are required for onboarding.

trans-unit.source: Based on your current setup, we’ll provide a remediation plan that will bring your source environment up to the minimum requirements for successful onboarding to Microsoft Azure AD Premium.
trans-unit.target: Based on your current setup, we’ll provide a remediation plan that will bring your source environment up to the minimum requirements for successful onboarding to Microsoft Azure AD Premium.

trans-unit.source: We’ll also set up appropriate checkpoint calls for the remediation phase.
trans-unit.target: We’ll also set up appropriate checkpoint calls for the remediation phase.

trans-unit.source: Remediate phase
trans-unit.target: Remediate phase

trans-unit.source: If needed, you’ll do the tasks in the remediation plan on your source environment so that you meet the requirements for onboarding each service.
trans-unit.target: If needed, you’ll do the tasks in the remediation plan on your source environment so that you meet the requirements for onboarding each service.

trans-unit.source: Before beginning the Enable phase, we’ll jointly verify the outcomes of the remediation activities to make sure you’re ready to proceed.
trans-unit.target: Before beginning the Enable phase, we’ll jointly verify the outcomes of the remediation activities to make sure you’re ready to proceed.

trans-unit.source: Enable phase
trans-unit.target: Enable phase

trans-unit.source: When all remediation activities are complete, the project shifts to configuring the core infrastructure for service consumption and to provisioning Microsoft Azure AD Premium.
trans-unit.target: When all remediation activities are complete, the project shifts to configuring the core infrastructure for service consumption and to provisioning Microsoft Azure AD Premium.

trans-unit.source: Enable phase - Core capabilities
trans-unit.target: Enable phase - Core capabilities

trans-unit.source: Enabling core capabilities involves service provisioning and tenant and identity integration.
trans-unit.target: Enabling core capabilities involves service provisioning and tenant and identity integration.

trans-unit.source: It also includes steps for providing a foundation for onboarding Microsoft Azure AD Premium.
trans-unit.target: It also includes steps for providing a foundation for onboarding Microsoft Azure AD Premium.

trans-unit.source: Onboarding for Microsoft Azure AD Premium can begin when core onboarding is finished.
trans-unit.target: Onboarding for Microsoft Azure AD Premium can begin when core onboarding is finished.

trans-unit.source: Enable phase – Microsoft Azure AD Premium
trans-unit.target: Enable phase – Microsoft Azure AD Premium

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Azure AD Premium environment can be set up with Azure AD Connect directory synchronization and Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS), as needed.
trans-unit.target: The Microsoft Azure AD Premium environment can be set up with Azure AD Connect directory synchronization and Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS), as needed.

trans-unit.source: For Microsoft Azure AD Premium scenarios that include synchronizing on-premises identities to the cloud, we’ll help you by adding IT administrators and users to your subscription, configuring management prerequisites, setting up Microsoft Azure AD Premium, setting up directory synchronization using Azure AD Connect, and Active Directory Federation Services using Azure AD Connect, configuring test users and validating your core use cases for the service.
trans-unit.target: For Microsoft Azure AD Premium scenarios that include synchronizing on-premises identities to the cloud, we’ll help you by adding IT administrators and users to your subscription, configuring management prerequisites, setting up Microsoft Azure AD Premium, setting up directory synchronization using Azure AD Connect, and Active Directory Federation Services using Azure AD Connect, configuring test users and validating your core use cases for the service.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Azure AD Premium setup includes enabling the following features:
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Azure AD Premium setup includes enabling the following features:

trans-unit.source: Self Service Password Reset (SSPR)
trans-unit.target: Self Service Password Reset (SSPR)

trans-unit.source: Azure Multi-factor Authentication (MFA)
trans-unit.target: Azure Multi-factor Authentication (MFA)

trans-unit.source: Software as a Service (SaaS) application--set up one SaaS application
trans-unit.target: Software as a Service (SaaS) application--set up one SaaS application

trans-unit.source: Self-Service Group Management (SSGM)
trans-unit.target: Self-Service Group Management (SSGM)

trans-unit.source: Administrative reports
trans-unit.target: Administrative reports

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Microsoft responsibilities
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Microsoft responsibilities

trans-unit.source: General
trans-unit.target: General

trans-unit.source: Provide remote support assistance to you for the required configuration activities, as described in the detailed phase descriptions.
trans-unit.target: Provide remote support assistance to you for the required configuration activities, as described in the detailed phase descriptions.

trans-unit.source: Provide available documentation and software tools, admin consoles, and scripts to help you reduce or eliminate configuration tasks.
trans-unit.target: Provide available documentation and software tools, admin consoles, and scripts to help you reduce or eliminate configuration tasks.

trans-unit.source: Providing access and permissions to Microsoft isn’t required to use the FastTrack Center benefit.
trans-unit.target: Providing access and permissions to Microsoft isn’t required to use the FastTrack Center benefit.

trans-unit.source: In some cases, you can choose to give Microsoft the appropriate access and permissions to perform specific activities on your behalf.
trans-unit.target: In some cases, you can choose to give Microsoft the appropriate access and permissions to perform specific activities on your behalf.

trans-unit.source: Initiate phase
trans-unit.target: Initiate phase

trans-unit.source: Contact you within 30 days of the purchase of eligible licenses for a new tenant.
trans-unit.target: Contact you within 30 days of the purchase of eligible licenses for a new tenant.

trans-unit.source: Work with you to begin onboarding within 90 days from purchase of eligible licenses.
trans-unit.target: Work with you to begin onboarding within 90 days from purchase of eligible licenses.

trans-unit.source: Define which eligible services you want to onboard.
trans-unit.target: Define which eligible services you want to onboard.

trans-unit.source: Assess phase
trans-unit.target: Assess phase

trans-unit.source: Provide an administrative overview.
trans-unit.target: Provide an administrative overview.

trans-unit.source: Provide guidance with:
trans-unit.target: Provide guidance with:

trans-unit.source: DNS, network, and infrastructure needs.
trans-unit.target: DNS, network, and infrastructure needs.

trans-unit.source: Client needs (Internet browser, client operating system, and services' needs).
trans-unit.target: Client needs (Internet browser, client operating system, and services' needs).

trans-unit.source: User identity and provisioning.
trans-unit.target: User identity and provisioning.

trans-unit.source: Identification of Directory Synchronization requirements.
trans-unit.target: Identification of Directory Synchronization requirements.

trans-unit.source: Determining if password hash sync meets customer goals, or if AD FS is required.
trans-unit.target: Determining if password hash sync meets customer goals, or if AD FS is required.

trans-unit.source: Enabling eligible services that have been purchased and defined to be part of the onboarding.
trans-unit.target: Enabling eligible services that have been purchased and defined to be part of the onboarding.

trans-unit.source: Identifying required piloting and test environment requirements, e.g., test accounts, test instance of SaaS application (e.g., SalesForce).
trans-unit.target: Identifying required piloting and test environment requirements, e.g., test accounts, test instance of SaaS application (e.g., SalesForce).

trans-unit.source: Establish the timeline for remediation activities.
trans-unit.target: Establish the timeline for remediation activities.

trans-unit.source: Provide a remediation checklist.
trans-unit.target: Provide a remediation checklist.

trans-unit.source: Remediate phase
trans-unit.target: Remediate phase

trans-unit.source: Hold conference calls with you according to the agreed-upon schedule to review the progress of the remediation activities.
trans-unit.target: Hold conference calls with you according to the agreed-upon schedule to review the progress of the remediation activities.

trans-unit.source: Assist with running tools to identify and remediate issues, and with interpreting the results.
trans-unit.target: Assist with running tools to identify and remediate issues, and with interpreting the results.

trans-unit.source: Enable phase
trans-unit.target: Enable phase

trans-unit.source: Provide guidance about:
trans-unit.target: Provide guidance about:

trans-unit.source: Activating your Microsoft Azure AD Premium tenant.
trans-unit.target: Activating your Microsoft Azure AD Premium tenant.

trans-unit.source: Configuring firewall ports.
trans-unit.target: Configuring firewall ports.

trans-unit.source: Configuring DNS for eligible services.
trans-unit.target: Configuring DNS for eligible services.

trans-unit.source: Validating connectivity to Microsoft Azure AD Premium services.
trans-unit.target: Validating connectivity to Microsoft Azure AD Premium services.

trans-unit.source: For a single-forest environment:
trans-unit.target: For a single-forest environment:

trans-unit.source: Installing a directory synchronization between your Active Directory Domain Services (AD DS) and Azure AD Connect, if required.
trans-unit.target: Installing a directory synchronization between your Active Directory Domain Services (AD DS) and Azure AD Connect, if required.

trans-unit.source: Configuring password synchronization with the Azure AD Connect tool.
trans-unit.target: Configuring password synchronization with the Azure AD Connect tool.

trans-unit.source: For a multiple forest environment:
trans-unit.target: For a multiple forest environment:

trans-unit.source: Install Azure AD Connect synchronization, set up for multiple forest scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Install Azure AD Connect synchronization, set up for multiple forest scenarios.

trans-unit.source: Note that password hash sync and password writeback support multiple forest.
trans-unit.target: Note that password hash sync and password writeback support multiple forest.

trans-unit.source: However, other writeback scenarios are not supported.
trans-unit.target: However, other writeback scenarios are not supported.

trans-unit.source: Configure synchronization between on-premises Active Directory forests and Microsoft Azure AD Premium directory (Azure Active Directory).
trans-unit.target: Configure synchronization between on-premises Active Directory forests and Microsoft Azure AD Premium directory (Azure Active Directory).

trans-unit.source: Development and implementation for custom rules extensions are out of scope.
trans-unit.target: Development and implementation for custom rules extensions are out of scope.

trans-unit.source: For a single forest when the target is federated identities: Installing and configuring Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) for local domain authentication with Microsoft Azure AD Premium in a single-site, fault-tolerant configuration, if required.
trans-unit.target: For a single forest when the target is federated identities: Installing and configuring Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) for local domain authentication with Microsoft Azure AD Premium in a single-site, fault-tolerant configuration, if required.

trans-unit.source: For all multiple forest configurations, AD FS deployments are out of scope.
trans-unit.target: For all multiple forest configurations, AD FS deployments are out of scope.

trans-unit.source: Testing single sign-on (SSO) functionality, if deployed.
trans-unit.target: Testing single sign-on (SSO) functionality, if deployed.

trans-unit.source: Enable phase - Azure AD Premium--with Azure AD Connect and AD FS
trans-unit.target: Enable phase - Azure AD Premium--with Azure AD Connect and AD FS

trans-unit.source: Provide guidance about setting up:
trans-unit.target: Provide guidance about setting up:

trans-unit.source: User provisioning, including licensing.
trans-unit.target: User provisioning, including licensing.

trans-unit.source: Azure AD Connect directory synchronization (with password writeback and password hash sync).
trans-unit.target: Azure AD Connect directory synchronization (with password writeback and password hash sync).

trans-unit.source: Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS).
trans-unit.target: Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS).

trans-unit.source: Self-Service Password Reset (SSPR).
trans-unit.target: Self-Service Password Reset (SSPR).

trans-unit.source: Azure Multi-factor Authentication (MFA).
trans-unit.target: Azure Multi-factor Authentication (MFA).

trans-unit.source: One integrated application, which can include Single Sign-On for SaaS applications.
trans-unit.target: One integrated application, which can include Single Sign-On for SaaS applications.

trans-unit.source: Usage and security reports to administrators.
trans-unit.target: Usage and security reports to administrators.

trans-unit.source: Self Service Group Management (SSGM).
trans-unit.target: Self Service Group Management (SSGM).

trans-unit.source: Application proxy.
trans-unit.target: Application proxy.

trans-unit.source: Administrator notifications.
trans-unit.target: Administrator notifications.

trans-unit.source: Customized logon screen, including logo, text and images.
trans-unit.target: Customized logon screen, including logo, text and images.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Your responsibilities
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Your responsibilities

trans-unit.source: This section describes some of your responsibilities during the onboarding process.
trans-unit.target: This section describes some of your responsibilities during the onboarding process.

trans-unit.source: General
trans-unit.target: General

trans-unit.source: Any enhancements and integrations to your Microsoft Azure AD Premium tenant beyond the configurable options listed in this article.
trans-unit.target: Any enhancements and integrations to your Microsoft Azure AD Premium tenant beyond the configurable options listed in this article.

trans-unit.source: Overall program and project management of your resources.
trans-unit.target: Overall program and project management of your resources.

trans-unit.source: End-user communications, documentation, training, and change management.
trans-unit.target: End-user communications, documentation, training, and change management.

trans-unit.source: Helpdesk documentation and training.
trans-unit.target: Helpdesk documentation and training.

trans-unit.source: Producing any reports, presentations, or meeting minutes that are specific to your organization.
trans-unit.target: Producing any reports, presentations, or meeting minutes that are specific to your organization.

trans-unit.source: Creating architectural and technical documentation specific to your organization.
trans-unit.target: Creating architectural and technical documentation specific to your organization.

trans-unit.source: Designing, procuring, installing, and configuring hardware and networking.
trans-unit.target: Designing, procuring, installing, and configuring hardware and networking.

trans-unit.source: Procuring, installing, and configuring software.
trans-unit.target: Procuring, installing, and configuring software.

trans-unit.source: Managing, configuring, and applying security policies beyond those created for testing your Microsoft Azure AD Premium services baseline configuration and functionality.
trans-unit.target: Managing, configuring, and applying security policies beyond those created for testing your Microsoft Azure AD Premium services baseline configuration and functionality.

trans-unit.source: Enrolling user accounts beyond those used to test the Microsoft Azure AD Premium services baseline configuration and functionality.
trans-unit.target: Enrolling user accounts beyond those used to test the Microsoft Azure AD Premium services baseline configuration and functionality.

trans-unit.source: Network configuration, analysis, bandwidth validation, testing, and monitoring.
trans-unit.target: Network configuration, analysis, bandwidth validation, testing, and monitoring.

trans-unit.source: Managing a technical change management approval process and creating supporting documentation.
trans-unit.target: Managing a technical change management approval process and creating supporting documentation.

trans-unit.source: Modifying your operational model and operation guides.
trans-unit.target: Modifying your operational model and operation guides.

trans-unit.source: Setting up on-premise multifactor authentication.
trans-unit.target: Setting up on-premise multifactor authentication.

trans-unit.source: Decommissioning and removing source environments and services previously used by the customer.
trans-unit.target: Decommissioning and removing source environments and services previously used by the customer.

trans-unit.source: Constructing and maintaining your test environment.
trans-unit.target: Constructing and maintaining your test environment.

trans-unit.source: Installing service packs and other required updates on infrastructure servers.
trans-unit.target: Installing service packs and other required updates on infrastructure servers.

trans-unit.source: Providing and configuring any public SSL certificates.
trans-unit.target: Providing and configuring any public SSL certificates.

trans-unit.source: Writing the organization’s Terms of Use (TOU) statement to be configured and displayed on devices owned by end users.
trans-unit.target: Writing the organization’s Terms of Use (TOU) statement to be configured and displayed on devices owned by end users.

trans-unit.source: Initiate phase
trans-unit.target: Initiate phase

trans-unit.source: Work with the Microsoft team to begin onboarding of eligible services.
trans-unit.target: Work with the Microsoft team to begin onboarding of eligible services.

trans-unit.source: Participate in the engagement kick-off meeting, manage and lead participants from your organization, and confirm remediation timelines.
trans-unit.target: Participate in the engagement kick-off meeting, manage and lead participants from your organization, and confirm remediation timelines.

trans-unit.source: Assess phase
trans-unit.target: Assess phase

trans-unit.source: Identify appropriate stakeholders (including a project manager) to complete the necessary assessment activities.
trans-unit.target: Identify appropriate stakeholders (including a project manager) to complete the necessary assessment activities.

trans-unit.source: If you choose to, share your screen with Microsoft if guidance is needed when running evaluation tools against your environment or your Microsoft Azure AD Premium subscription.
trans-unit.target: If you choose to, share your screen with Microsoft if guidance is needed when running evaluation tools against your environment or your Microsoft Azure AD Premium subscription.

trans-unit.source: Participate in the meetings to create the remediation checklist and to contribute to the overall plan, including infrastructure, network, administration, directory synchronization preparation, network security, and federated identity topics.
trans-unit.target: Participate in the meetings to create the remediation checklist and to contribute to the overall plan, including infrastructure, network, administration, directory synchronization preparation, network security, and federated identity topics.

trans-unit.source: Participate in the meetings to outline the user-provisioning approach.
trans-unit.target: Participate in the meetings to outline the user-provisioning approach.

trans-unit.source: Participate in the meetings to plan online service configuration.
trans-unit.target: Participate in the meetings to plan online service configuration.

trans-unit.source: Create a support plan for migration readiness.
trans-unit.target: Create a support plan for migration readiness.

trans-unit.source: Remediate phase
trans-unit.target: Remediate phase

trans-unit.source: Perform required steps to complete remediation activities identified in the Assess phase.
trans-unit.target: Perform required steps to complete remediation activities identified in the Assess phase.

trans-unit.source: Participate in checkpoint meetings.
trans-unit.target: Participate in checkpoint meetings.

trans-unit.source: Enable phase
trans-unit.target: Enable phase

trans-unit.source: If you choose to, share your screen with Microsoft if guidance is needed when making changes to your environment or to your Microsoft Azure AD Premium subscription.
trans-unit.target: If you choose to, share your screen with Microsoft if guidance is needed when making changes to your environment or to your Microsoft Azure AD Premium subscription.

trans-unit.source: Manage resources as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: Manage resources as appropriate.

trans-unit.source: Configure network-related items per guidance from Microsoft.
trans-unit.target: Configure network-related items per guidance from Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: Perform directory readiness and configure directory synchronization per guidance from Microsoft.
trans-unit.target: Perform directory readiness and configure directory synchronization per guidance from Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: Configure security-related infrastructure (such as firewall ports) per guidance from Microsoft.
trans-unit.target: Configure security-related infrastructure (such as firewall ports) per guidance from Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: Implement the appropriate client infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Implement the appropriate client infrastructure.

trans-unit.source: Implement a user-provisioning approach per guidance from Microsoft.
trans-unit.target: Implement a user-provisioning approach per guidance from Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: Enable various services per guidance from Microsoft.
trans-unit.target: Enable various services per guidance from Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: Want to learn more?
trans-unit.target: Want to learn more?

trans-unit.source: See <link><linkText>Microsoft Azure Active Directory</linkText><title></title></link> and <link><linkText>Enterprise Mobility Suite</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link><linkText>Microsoft Azure Active Directory</linkText><title></title></link> and <link><linkText>Enterprise Mobility Suite</linkText><title></title></link>.
